attributes.review: when i heard about this app i was elated!! i‚Äôve been looking for an orange cheeto themed dating app for all my life. but when i read the info, it was a little bit misleading to say the least. it said it was the official trump 2020 app, which it is not. it‚Äôs a literal knockoff of tinder! it took an entire month to download. when orange spray tan started leaking out of my phone, that‚Äôs when i knew it was ready and even though i was a little frustrated with how the app presented itself and how long it took to install, i was just happy it finally worked, though it did ruin my phone. when i opened the app it made a high pitched noise that made my cat mutate into peaches and she wouldn‚Äôt stop complaining about her itching and burning c*och! üòæ so now i have that to deal with and on top of that, i was NOT satisfied with the dating app features. the entire app was filled with people catfishing as roaches. everyone please just settle for tinder!!! this will waste your dating life experience. ‚ù§Ô∏è

attributes.review:
I decided to download the app in order to get a better representation of what the country would look like if it was run by the Annoying Orange. Unfortunately after the almost six week long download and nine day long update I was met with a strange amount of people with the snowflake emoji as there profile picture. I believe that the president could be starting a secret club where all of his members are called the snowflakes. 

All in all it seems like a basic book club. If you are reading this Mr. Trump (which I highly doubt since you are hard at work on the golf course) I recommend reading Trevor Noah‚Äôs biography Born a Crime: Stories from a South African Childhood. It is a classic coming of age story by one of Americas most adorned men. He is able to mix comedy into a story that mamy Americans can easily understand. EVEN YOU!! :) 

Anyways, I hope this helped anyone who has still not Made A decision aNd is lookiNg for a new social media platform as well as an opportunitY to join a new club.
attributes.title: Too many snowflakes
